# Automated-Network-Request-Management

### Overview

This project focuses on automating the complete process of handling network service requests in ServiceNow. Users can easily raise requests through the Service Portal, while approvals, task assignments, data tracking, and notifications are handled automatically using Flow Designer.

### Key Features

* User-friendly Service Catalog item for network requests
* Dynamic form behavior implemented using UI Policies
* Automated approval process through Flow Designer
* Auto-generated tasks assigned to the network support team
* Email alerts sent at every important stage
* Custom Network Database table to store and track request details

### Modules Used

* Service Catalog
* Flow Designer
* Custom Tables (u_network_database)
* UI Policies and Business Rules
* Email Notifications

### Workflow Summary

Service Portal → Network Request Submission → Approval → Task Assignment → Notifications → Request Closure

### Testing

The application was tested to ensure:

* Successful catalog form submission
* Proper approval flow execution
* Accurate task creation
* Smooth flow completion
* Timely email notifications

### Conclusion

This project helps reduce manual work, speeds up request processing, and ensures a structured and transparent workflow for managing network service requests efficiently.
